titles.title: Forest Health Act of 1994

A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out activities on certain federally owned lands to address the adverse effects of 1994 wildfires in the western portion of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13301-13302)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/22/1994--Introduced. Forest Health Act of 1994 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out specified forest restoration activities on Federal lands in the West that were adversely affected by wildfires.
